sentences.en: "Now, it fills one granary and half of another"—roughly a 50 percent increase in production.

sentences.en: And then it will be gathered into the granary and sowed for a 3 rd harvest.
sentences.cn: 这次也会被收进仓中,然后为著第三次丰收又被撒出.

sentences.en: Bureau of Cultural Relics, Hebei Province in 1992 allocated 20,000 yuan strengthening emergency granary maintenance.
sentences.cn: 1992年河北省文物局拨款2万元抢险加固维修义仓.

sentences.en: Every journey has its low point, and ours was the granary of France, known as the Beauce.
sentences.cn: 每次旅行都有低潮，我们的低潮是在贝奥斯，这里是有名的法兰西谷仓。

sentences.en: Large tracts of wasteland have become a granary.
